Module ntnu.idatt1002
Package ntnu.idatt1002.dao

Class ProjectDAO

java.lang.Object
ntnu.idatt1002.dao.ProjectDAO
public final class ProjectDAO
extends java.lang.Object
The class ProjectDAO provides static methods for handling projects under a User folder. In the storage system projects are stored under the 'Projects' directory, and each project are stored as folders. Under these project folders their respective categories are stored, which containts Task files.

    ProjectDAO()

    static boolean delete​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String project)

    Delete all projects inside a User.

  • Constructor Details

    • ProjectDAO

      public ProjectDAO()

  • Method Details

    • list

      public static java.lang.String[] list​(java.lang.String username)
      Returns a String[] of all projects under a User folder.
      Parameters:
      username - the username variable in a User.
      Returns:
      an array of projects. Returns null if folder is empty.

    • add

      public static boolean add​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String project)
      Add a new project to a User. This folder will be created under the 'Projects' folder.
      Parameters:
      username - the username variable in a User.
      project - the name of the new project.
      Returns:
      True if succesfull. False if directory could not be created. Either the user doesn't exist or a folder with the given name already exists.

    • deleteByUser

      public static boolean deleteByUser​(java.lang.String username)
      Delete all projects inside a User. This will empty the 'Projects' folder, all categories inside the projects, and their Task files.
      Parameters:
      username - the username variable in a User.
      Returns:
      True if succesfull. False if some or all elements failed to delete, normally if the user doesn't exist.

    • delete

      public static boolean delete​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String project)
      Delete a project in a User folder with all categories and Task files within.
      Parameters:
      username - the username variable in a User.
      project - the name of the project to delete.
      Returns:
      True if succesfull. False if some or all elements failed to delete, either the user or the project doesn't exist.

    • exists

      static boolean exists​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String project)
      Check if the project exists.
      Parameters:
      username - the username variable in a User.
      project - the name of the project.
      Returns:
      True or False.
